    SecondarySort

    public static class SecondarySort.Reduce
extends Reducer<SecondarySort.IntPair,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable>
    A reducer class that just emits the sum of the input values.

      • reduce

        public void reduce(SecondarySort.IntPair key,
          Iterable<org.apache.hadoop.io.IntWritable> values,
          Reducer.Context context)
            throws IOException,
                   InterruptedException
        Description copied from class: Reducer
        This method is called once for each key. Most applications will define their reduce class by overriding this method. The default implementation is an identity function.
